title: Bug 2120 - MRU File List is not persisted between sessions (1GE71Z0)
OB: When starting the workbench and opening multiple files, the MRU (Most Recently Used) File List in the File menu shows the files that were recently opened. However, after shutting down the workbench and restarting it, the MRU File List does not display any of the previously opened files.
EB: The MRU File List should persist between sessions, so that when the workbench is restarted, the File menu displays the files that were previously opened.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Start the workbench. 
2. Open 2 or 3 files. 
3. Shutdown the workbench. 
4. Restart the workbench.
